attributes.additional_details:
For decades, this country has been protected from harm by our Armed Forces, they are called upon by this government when they are needed, they dont moan or go on strike, they just pack their bags and get on with it.
So when all servicemen and women need to recognised for their dedication, by asking the government to produce a medal to honour our boys and girls, the same government that calls upon you lets you down, and says no.
We the Veteran want The National Defence Medal, please help us to get this petition to parliament, so that we can honour all of them.
